TestItem.Stem: According to paragraph 5, if the man pictured with the birdlike head is not a shaman, he may have worn the headmask

Distractor_list.Distractor: to look like an animal while a hunt took place
to frighten off other hunters competing for food
to prove that he is not a shaman
to resist forces of nature thought to be present in animals

TestItem.Glossary: holy people who act as healers and diviners
